chunks.title: For Loops in Python .mp3
chunks.text: In our life, we have to repeat some things.

chunks.title: For Loops in Python .mp3
chunks.text: to fill all these bottles with water and keep them in the fridge,

chunks.title: For Loops in Python .mp3
chunks.text: then you will do the same for every bottle.

chunks.text: In programming, we have to do some work.
